name: Development of User Stories / Features
userStory: Without developing the core features or stories, no tangible progress is made toward the overall project goals

name: Testing and Quality Assurance (QA)
userStory: Ensures that new features are bug-free and that existing functionality is not broken during development.

name: Sprint Review and Retrospective Preparation
userStory: Helps ensure transparency with stakeholders about the sprint progress and supports continuous improvement in the Agile process.
